channel.title: Apple going after HTC + Android
channel.description: Apple is sueing HTC...Not much to say about it, just read it.. http://www.engadget.com/2010/03/02/apple-sues-htc-for-infringing-20-iphone-patents http://www.engadget.com/2010/03/02/apple-specifically-going-after-android-in-htc-lawsuit/ fuck you apple.

item.title: Apple going after HTC + Android
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:15, topic:331403”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=427782.msg3141738#msg3141738 date=1267627150]
Software patents are good, but the haters patent system are fucking retarded, you are the result.
[/quote]
fix’t.[/quote]
fixd’t

Read full topic

item.title: Apple going after HTC + Android
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Software patents are always silly but god damn I hope nothing comes from this. Been sitting on #android, discussion is awesome.

item.title: Apple going after HTC + Android
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

They are doing it to try and kill Android because it is hurting Apple’s iPhone sales, plain and simple.

Read full topic

item.title: Apple going after HTC + Android
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

I don’t even think it’s that, they have something like 36 billion just stashed away, they’re probably just doing it because they can.

Read full topic

item.title: Apple going after HTC + Android
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

This is just about the money though, they’re obviously trying to make the most money possible out of this, which is why so many infringing patents have cropped up and on s many devices. Apple have waited until they have enough stuff to scrounge millions out of HTC.

Read full topic

item.title: Apple going after HTC + Android

item.description:
@Unlimited1 wrote:

brb patenting using arrows to make you go left and right

Read full topic

item.title: Apple going after HTC + Android
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:7, topic:331403”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=427782.msg3141374#msg3141374 date=1267567094]
The problem is the entire patent system. The people there aren’t programmers, and therefore don’t know what is ubiquitous and trivial.
[/quote]

  • technology changes with time. What at one time might seem novel will be generally accepted as the norm in the future.[/quote]
    As is the case with an “Object-Oriented Graphic System”, though even that shouldn’t be considered close to novel in 1995. I will have to read the actual patent document, but going by the title, Apple should be suing quite a few other companies on that one.

Read full topic

item.title: Apple going after HTC + Android
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:4, topic:331403”]That Microsoft patent, while humorous, isn’t dumb. Patenting the double click, however, is.

As is patenting sliding between user interfaces.[/quote]
And the “Unlocking A Device By Performing Gestures On An Unlock Image”

item.title: Apple going after HTC + Android
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Unhandled:

rofl some of these patents are almost as dumb as microsoft’s.

"A newly disclosed Microsoft patent application — Avatar Individualized by Physical Characteristic — takes aim at fat people, proposing to generate fat avatars in gaming environments for individuals whose health records indicate they're overweight, limiting their game play, and even banning them.
io9.

@topic: Why the fuck are they trying to sue android when it’s all open source and therefore a non-profit organisation? + why the fuck are they patenting all these dumb power-saving features…

Read full topic

item.title: Apple going after HTC + Android
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

The '331 Patent, entitled "Time-Based, Non-Constant Translation Of User Interface Objects Between States," was duly and legally issued on April 22, 2008 by the United States Patent and Trademark Office.
The '599 Patent, entitled "Object-Oriented Graphic System," was duly and legally issued on October 3, 1995 by the United States Patent and Trademark Office.
The '354 Patent, entitled "Object-Oriented Event Notification System With Listener Registration Of Both Interests And Methods," was duly and legally issued on July 23, 2002 by the United States Patent and Trademark Office.

rofl some of these patents are almost as dumb as microsoft’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Apple going after HTC + Android
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Apple is sueing HTC…Not much to say about it, just read it…

Engadget

Apple sues HTC for infringing 20 iPhone patents

Looks like Apple's going on the warpath, kids. Just a few months after Cupertino got into it with Nokia over phone patents, Apple's filed suit against HTC, alle...


Engadget

Apple specifically going after Android in HTC lawsuit

There's no delicate way to put this: at least part of Apple's patent lawsuit against HTC appears to be a proxy fight for a larger issue with Android as a whole...


fuck you apple.

Read full topic
